meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to hatch.
meanings.sent1: The hatchabilities of the eggs were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the hatchabilities of different bird species.
meanings.sent3: The farmer joked about the chicken's hatchabilities being better than his own.
meanings.sent4: The hatchabilities of the dragon's eggs were legendary.
meanings.sent5: The hatchabilities of the ostrich eggs amazed the zoo visitors.

meanings.definition: The likelihood or potential for successful hatching.
meanings.sent1: The hatchabilities of the rare bird were uncertain.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper monitored the hatchabilities of the turtle eggs.
meanings.sent3: The children were excited to learn about the hatchabilities of the dinosaur eggs.
meanings.sent4: The hatchabilities of the ancient artifact were shrouded in mystery.
meanings.sent5: The farmer carefully assessed the hatchabilities of the quail eggs.
